DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess gastroprotective agent compliance in patients at risk suffering from a gastrointestinal bleeding ulcer or a symptomatic ulcer with NSAID.
DOC.brief_title: Gastroprotective Agent Compliance in Patients at Risk Suffering From a Gastrointestinal(GI) Ulcer
DOC.criteria: Patients at risk suffering from a gastrointestinal bleeding ulcer or a symptomatic ulcer confirmed by endoscopy
DOC.keyword: Gastrointestinal bleeding ulcer or symptomatic ulcer with NSAID
